name: vtex-agent
description: A local RAG agent that answers questions using documentation. Runs with Ollama + ChromaDB.

scripts.docker:app:restart: docker compose stop app && docker compose start app
scripts.docker:setup: pnpm docker:services && sleep 10 && pnpm docker:ollama:pull && pnpm chroma:fresh && pnpm docker:app
scripts.docker:reingest: docker compose stop app && pnpm chroma:fresh && docker compose start app
scripts.chroma:sync: pnpm ingest:urls && pnpm ingest:openapi && pnpm ingest:sitemap && pnpm ingest:manual
scripts.chroma:fresh: tsx scripts/countdown.ts && pnpm chroma:reset && pnpm chroma:sync
scripts.ollama:pull: ollama pull qwen2.5:7b && ollama pull mxbai-embed-large
scripts.docker:ollama:pull: docker compose exec ollama ollama pull qwen2.5:7b && docker compose exec ollama ollama pull mxbai-embed-large
